title: New BITMAIN Antminer S21 XP 270T 3645W 13.5W/T BTC Bitcoin ASIC Crypto Miner Include Power Cord
body_html:
Brand: OEMGMINER

Features:

  • High Efficiency: The Antminer S21 XP 270T is a top-tier Bitcoin miner with an impressive efficiency of 13.5W/T, maximizing your BTC mining potential while minimizing energy consumption.
  • Advanced ASIC Technology: This cutting-edge ASIC miner ensures superior performance and reliability, making it the ideal choice for serious crypto miners seeking optimized operations.
  • Exceptional Hash Rate: With a powerful hash rate of 270 TH/s, this crypto miner excels in processing transactions quickly, providing a competitive edge in the Bitcoin mining industry.
  • Robust Design: Built for durability, the Antminer S21 XP is engineered to withstand extended periods of intense mining, ensuring stable and consistent BTC production.
  • User-Friendly Setup: Designed with ease of use in mind, this Bitcoin miner offers straightforward installation and maintenance, perfect for both novice and experienced cryptocurrency enthusiasts.

Binding: Personal Computers

Details: New BITMAIN Antminer S21 XP 270T 3645W 13.5W/T BTC Bitcoin Miner ASIC Miner Crypto Miner Include Power Cord (270T 3645W 13.5W/T)
